title: Marketplace Money for Friday, August 2, 2013
teaser: For the last three weeks, we’ve gone back to the basics…understanding concepts like banking, savings and investing.  Today, we wrap up our series  with a look at one of the most important money relationships you have.  It takes maintenance, self awareness, and self control.  It's your life with credit and debt.   How do you build or rebuild a credit history?  How many cards should you have?  And what’s the best card for you?  This week, a guide to credit and debt.
byline: Margaret Aery, Adrienne Hill, Raghu Manavalan and Lindsay Foster Thomas
